DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to examine the effects of various increasing doses of Ralfinamide in patients with neuropathic pain.
DOC.brief_title: Phase II Dose Titration Study in Patients With Neuropathic Pain
DOC.criteria: Male or female patients Females postmenopausal for at least 12 months, 24 months in India, Poland, and Austria Diagnosed by neurologist with current neuropathic pain See inclusion criteria
